resources.string: Camera settings;Quality;Image quality;Image location;Picture location;Face detection;Camera sound
"Still can't connect to camera. Try restarting your device."
Insert SD card before using camera
Tag your photos and videos with the locations where they are taken. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.
Lock touch gestures when placed in a pocket
To turn this feature off, press the Volume up and Back buttons simultaneously.
USB storage is running out of space
SD card is running out of space
Tap the arrow to switch direction and begin panning slowly.
Front camera background blur is off
Front camera background blur is on
Make a sound to take a photo
"Can't burst shoot while audio capture is on"
"Can't use this video-size for time-lapse recording"
Only the rear camera can scan QR codes in the \"Photo\" mode.
Show age and gender when Beautify is on
Show age when Beautify is on
Taking photo, keep the device still
For best results, your photo should contain objects both near (less than 1 meter from the lens) and far
To select an object, simultaneously tap two diagonal points around its border.
To select an object, tap two diagonal points around its border. When the object is stationary, the camera will snap a shot automatically.
Press & hold Shutter button to lock AE/AF/AWB
"Another app may already be using the device's microphone to record."
"Can't use Quick snap mode while \"Wake with Volume buttons\" is on."
Align the arrow with the reference line
The camera is too close to the object.
"Make sure the object isn't further than 2 meters."
"Portrait mode blurs the background and brings out the people in the front."
Long pressing the volume button triggers NFC now. Replace this feature?
Video call is in progress, try again later.
"Camera will take multiple photos and then create a shot where everyone looks best."
"In low light, camera will take multiple photos and then create a shot with a minimal amount of noise."
The video you shoot will be played faster.
The video you shoot will be played slower.
Dual camera watermark will be added automatically.
Auto focus / auto exposure has been locked
Photo watermark will be added automatically.

"Scanner allows you to scan QR codes, barcodes, and more. You don't have to connect to the internet to install it."
Tap to focus, then tap again to take a photo.
Switch camera to the previously used mode when you open the app.
"Taking selfies will be easier if you rotate your phone"
"AI camera detects scenes automatically and optimizes your photos based on this info"
